00042 #define _xmlattribute_cpp

00046 #define TIXML_USE_TICPP
00047 #include <ticpp.h>
00048 
00049 namespace phys
00050 {
00051     namespace xml
00052     {
00053             Attribute::Attribute()
00054                 { this->Wrapped = new ticpp::Attribute(); }
00055 
00056             Attribute::Attribute (const String &name, const String &value)
00057                 { this->Wrapped = new ticpp::Attribute(name,value); }
00058 
00059             Attribute::Attribute(ticpp::Attribute* Meta)
00060                 { this->Wrapped = Meta; }
00061 
00062             Attribute::~Attribute()
00063                 { delete this->Wrapped; }
00064 
00065             String Attribute::GetValue() const
00066                 { return (static_cast<ticpp::Attribute*> (this->Wrapped))->Value(); }
00067 
00068             void Attribute::SetValue (const Whole &value)
00069                 { (static_cast<ticpp::Attribute*> (this->Wrapped))->SetValue(value);}
00070 
00071             void Attribute::SetValue (const Real &value)
00072                 { (static_cast<ticpp::Attribute*> (this->Wrapped))->SetValue(value);}
00073 
00074             void Attribute::SetValue (const String &value)
00075                 { (static_cast<ticpp::Attribute*> (this->Wrapped))->SetValue(value);}
00076 
00077             void Attribute::SetName(const String &Name)
00078                 { (static_cast<ticpp::Attribute*> (this->Wrapped))->SetName(Name);}
00079 
00080             String Attribute::GetName() const
00081                 { return (static_cast<ticpp::Attribute*> (this->Wrapped))->Name();}
00082 
00083             Attribute* Attribute::Next(bool throwIfNoAttribute) const
00084                 { return new Attribute((static_cast<ticpp::Attribute*> (this->Wrapped))->Next(throwIfNoAttribute));}
00085 
00086             Attribute* Attribute::Previous (bool throwIfNoAttribute) const
00087                 { return new Attribute((static_cast<ticpp::Attribute*> (this->Wrapped))->Previous(throwIfNoAttribute));}
00088 
00089             Attribute::XMLComponentType Attribute::GetType()
00090                 { return Base::isAttribute ; }
00091     }
